patthana22.17:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.17:1.1_1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.17:1.1_2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:2.1_0: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:3.1_0: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:4.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuñca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.17:4.1_1: (Dutiyaṁ gaṇitakena tīṇi.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… vipāke cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.17:5.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.17:6.1_0: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Dve pañhāyeva.)
patthana22.17:7.1_0: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Dveyeva. Paṭhamaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, dutiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ,
patthana22.17:7.1_1: tatiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
